title: Bilgewater Rewards: Do I have to choose Gangplank to get the last part of the story?
body: In the Act III Bilgewater Rewards, under TF & Graves, it talks about objectives, however under Gangplank's icon, it says "Unlock the story by-". I would prefer the first icon, but... I don't see why I should be locked out of lore for it? Could I get some clarification on the subject, please?

replies.body:
What objectives and icon you choose doesn't lock out any story.  You don't need to worry about that.

A lot of other questions are being answered over on the Act 3 Questions thread: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/tXjcpYAU-act-3-questions-about-the-bilgewater-event-we-got-you-covered

Hope that helps.  Pick your side with confidence!
is it an act 4 or an addon to the epilogue that is unlocked if you choose  Gangplank? will it be unlocked for everyone regardless of what we choose?
i was fully able to read act 3 before i even made a choice for the icon. i dont know if it unlocks a act 4 or something.
